description: “Auf Wiedersehen Pet” was one of the most popular British television shows in the 1980s. They stopped filming after the second season, but the show was revived and made a great comeback to television in 2002 for two more additional seasons. This application features the audio book “Auf Wiedersehen Pet – The Magnificent Seven”, by Fred Taylor, which stays true to the television show. The talented narrator Christopher Fairbanks brings all of the characters to life with warmth and humor. If you liked the television show, you will definitely love this great application.
